My recent visit to Ariella's Restaurant was a fantastic experience, and I highly recommended! Located across from Miller Field on Staten Island, it is a great spot for any occasion. The restaurant has a delightful ambiance; it is inviting with a trendy vibe.
The Apple Crusted Pork Chops with raspberry drizzle were delicious! The maple bourbon salmon was cooked to perfection and had a wonderful blend of flavors. The penne vodka kids meal was also a hit. All kids meals are served with a side of fries. My kids ate every bite.
The service and genuine care from the owner, Billy, set Ariella's apart. He ensured everything was perfect, making us feel welcomed and valued. The attentiveness and desire to provide a positive dining experience were evident and greatly appreciated.
Overall, Ariella's offers excellent food in a charming atmosphere. It is a true gem on Staten Island.

I recently dined at Ariella's Restaurant
And it was outstanding! The ambiance set the perfect tone for a delightful evening. The decor is charming and inviting, making it an ideal spot for any occasion.

The food was absolutely delicious! I was impressed by the variety on the menu, catering to all tastes and preferences. I got the salmon, my friend got the steak everything was cooked to perfection, all the sides were excellent, and the bacon ice cream was phenomenal.

The service was exceptional as well. The staff was attentive, friendly, and genuinely seemed to care about ensuring we had a wonderful experience. They were knowledgeable about the menu and offered great recommendations. What stood out the most was the affordability of the prices. Given the high quality of the food and service, I expected to pay much more. It's refreshing to find such a gem that doesn‚Äôt break the bank!

I highly recommend Ariella's Restaurant to anyone looking for a pleasant dining experience filled with delicious food, great service, and a lovely atmosphere. I can't wait to return!

Try it, you will not be disappointed!

Update Review: May 4, 2025 - Ariella's restaurant is what I hope every other restaurant would strive to become; after hearing about our imperfect experience, they took our criticism to heart and drastically improved everything we critiqued. This time around, the buffalo chicken dip was juicy and tender, which is evident in the picture! It's the perfect appetizer that I can imagine eating while watching the Super Bowl; it was flavorful, tender, creamy, and the amount of shredded chicken was plentiful. The coffee-rubbed ribeye was cooked perfectly medium rare this time, and paired with their soy glazed Brussel sprouts was the definition of perfection. This experience is what I always knew Ariella's restaurant is capable of, ever since our first time dining with them. Not only did they surpass our expectations, but they also respected our voice and took the steps to perfect their minor imperfections, exemplary of what exquisite dining looks like. We look forward to coming back to try the many more new additions to their ever evolving menu! Definitely give them a try and I promise you won't regret it! (Please consider adding the Lolipop lamb chops to the regular menu!)

Thank you for reading and best of luck! (:

Older review: The loli-pop lamb chops were by far the best dish we had at Ariella; the soy brussel sprouts were so incredibly rich and flavorful that it was the best brussel sprouts we ever had! The lamb chops were also plentiful, delicious, and cooked perfectly medium rare! The chicken vodka parm was also very tasty and creamy, a perfect balance! I definitely recommend trying them and I hope Ariella will consider putting both on their regular menu since these were from the Easter Dinner menu.

The steak was delicious and cooked perfectly, which we highly recommend! The burger was incredibly rich which can be nauseating for some due to how sweet and heavy it is. Overall it was a good experience and would definitely come back to see how much they improve since when we went they were just opened for less than a week. Can't wait to give Ariella the 5* I know they are capable of!

Thank you for reading and best of luck! (:

Ariella‚Äôs Restaurant is an incredible new addition to the New Dorp area! From the moment you walk in, you‚Äôre embraced by the warmth of family tradition. The atmosphere is inviting, and the decor, adorned with butterflies, beautifully honors the owner's mother and her fight against lupus.
